hero.text: Striving to translate creative and inventive ideas straight into efficient and future-proof implementations.

my-life.title: My Life
my-life.text: My name is Philip, also known as BlvckBytes. I’m {{myAge}} years old and have always been interested in all types of engineering.

education.title: Education
education.text: Although I’m mostly self-taught, I have graduated at a higher technical college of computer since.

pursuits.title: Pursuits
pursuits.text: Besides web design and full-stack web development, I’m also working with low level hardware and engineer my own circuits.
